title: ariyAyO nenjamE
sahitya:
ariyAyO nenjamE iraivanai aDaiyAyO tanjamE innamum


anupallavi

  pori vazhaiyAga nI puram senru tirivAi arivinukk-arivAgum antaryAmiyai nanrE


caraNam    nAl vaghait-tOTramum Ezhuyir Etramum nAnA uyirgaL undan mEniyAip-pOrttavan
pAlil veNNaip-pOlap-paghupparum puNNiyan parama patiyaip-pashupatiyaip-paragatiyai
